alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 18 at 9:44PM MDT until May 19 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...West wind 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected in the Cody Foothills, most likely around Clark. Gusts 75 to 80 mph expected in the Absarokas. * WHERE...Absaroka Mountains and Cody Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk, especially for light and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Impacts will be most possible on Wyoming Highway 120.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
